results.title: Mitochondrial encephalopathy, lactic acidosis, and stroke-like episodes diagnosed after metformin-triggered stroke-like episodes.
results.text_hl: He had been taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for 4 months.

citations.NLM: Murakami K, Sakamoto K, Ishiguchi H, Ito H. Mitochondrial encephalopathy, lactic acidosis, and stroke-like episodes diagnosed after metformin-triggered stroke-like episodes. J Stroke Cerebrovasc Dis. 2023 May;32(5):107080. PMID: 36933522

results.title: Effects of metformin on insulin resistance after injury in the rat.

results.title: Metformin inhibits growth and enhances radiation response of non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) through ATM and AMPK
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (i) activated the @<m>DISEASE_Ataxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001259 @@@ataxia telengiectasia-mutated@@@ (@GENE_ATM @GENE_472 @@@ATM@@@)-@GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@-@GENE_TP53 @GENE_7157 @@@p53@@@/@GENE_CDKN1A @GENE_1026 @@@p21cip1@@@ and inhibited the @GENE_AKT1 @GENE_207 @@@Akt@@@-@GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mammalian target of rapamycin@@@ (@GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@)-@GENE_EIF4EBP1 @GENE_1978 @@@eIF4E-binding protein 1@@@ (@GENE_EIF4EBP1 @GENE_1978 @@@4EBP1@@@) pathways, (ii) induced G1 cycle arrest and (iii) enhanced apoptosis.

citations.NLM: Storozhuk Y, Hopmans SN, Sanli T, Barron C, Tsiani E, Cutz JC, Pond G, Wright J, Singh G, Tsakiridis T. Metformin inhibits growth and enhances radiation response of non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) through ATM and AMPK Br J Cancer. 2013 May 28;108(10):2021-32. PMID: 23632475
